name: RunninOutOfPlatforms
description:
Progress through levels of platforming!

Solve Puzzles and know how to use every Move to your own advantage .

A lot of levels , A lot of Mechanics!

19 levels of Puzzles , 7 types of Platforms.

 

Solo Developer !

developed for Epic jam in 3 days ! (I was busy for Brackeys game Jam and only 3 day was left for me to make this game from Scratch ) and I did it (I think).
